pushpin_label_position = bottom | footnotes = }} Ab Daw is a village in Badakhshan Province, Afghanistan. It is about 16 miles northwest of Zebak. In the past, Ad Baw was mostly lived in by Tajiks. == References == Category:Settlements in Afghanistan Category:Badakhshan Province
